segments.text: Good morning , Felix Wasserman Associates . Beth Jennings speaking .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: This is James Hong calling from Lincoln Bank .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Hello , Mr Hong . What can I do for you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm calling to let you know that the funds for NX567822100007 have arrived .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's great ! That was quick , after it not being there yesterday I wasn't expecting to hear from you for a while .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , it's here now . Shall we credit that straight to your account ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: If you could , please . That would be wonderful , thanks .
segments.speaker: S1
